settings.heading: How To Know Your Bed size?

settings.text:
Getting a good night's sleep starts with finding the right mattress size that perfectly suits your sleep style and preferences. But did you know that many don't know what size mattress they've been sleeping on?

To ensure that you find the ideal mattress, sheets, or topper, it's essential to first assess your individual requirements and identify the size of your current bed or the one you might consider transitioning to.

Our simple and straightforward guide will provide you with all the information you need to identify your current bed size and determine whats best for your needs.

Beds come in all shapes and sizes, just like people! And just like we all have different body measurements, so do beds. But don't worry, finding out your bed size is as easy as a walk in the park (or a snooze on the bed)! All you need is a measuring tape and a few minutes of your time, lets do it!

settings.title: Step 1
settings.content: Remove all blankets and sheets completely from the bed.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.content:
Find a sturdy measuring
tape to use.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.content: Measure the width between the left side and right side of the mattress.

settings.title: Step 4
settings.content: Measure the length between the top and bottom of the mattress.

settings.title:
Single Mattress

92cm x 187cm
settings.content:
The single size mattresses are an excellent choice for both children and adults alike. With a width of 92cm and a length of 187cm (nearly two metres), the single mattresses are perfect for those seeking a first bed or for those looking for a mattress that offers ample space for one person to move around comfortably.

A single bed provides an individual with the same amount of space as two people in a King size bed, making it a great choice for those who value space and comfort. Additionally, single beds are perfect space savers, with the mattress dimensions fitting effortlessly into any bedroom.

settings.title:
King Single

106cm x 203cm
settings.content:
King Single mattresses offer more space than regular Single mattresses, making them an excellent option for older children, teenagers, and taller adults who want to stretch out comfortably while sleeping. They have a wider width of 106cm and a longer length of 203cm, providing ample space for a restful night's sleep.

Many families prefer investing in King Single mattresses from the beginning to avoid the hassle of changing beds as children grow older. They are also a great space-saving option for smaller bedrooms and apartments, fitting neatly into most spaces.

settings.title:
Double Mattress

137cm x 187cm
settings.content:
If you're considering a Double mattress, it's essential to understand that it's not always the best option for couples. The width of a Double mattress is only 137cm, which is just 38cm wider than a twin bed. This can feel cramped for two people, especially compared to the extra space provided by a Queen or King mattress.

However, Double mattresses are an excellent choice for single adults who want more space than a Twin. They provide ample space for a single sleeper and can even accommodate a partner in a pinch.

settings.title:
Queen Mattress

152cm x 203cm
settings.content:
Queen size mattresses are a popular choice for couples and individuals who prefer more space to sleep comfortably. At 152cm wide and 203cm long, a Queen size bed provides an additional 15cm of width and 13cm of length compared to a Double or Full mattress.

One of the primary benefits of a Queen size mattress is that it can comfortably accommodate two people while still fitting well in most bedrooms. The extra space allows each person to move around without disturbing their partner, reducing the likelihood of sleep disturbances.

If you're a couple looking for a comfortable sleep experience or a single sleeper who values extra space, a Queen size mattress may be the right choice for you.

settings.title:
King Mattress

183cm x 203cm
settings.content:
King size mattresses are known for their luxurious size and provide ample space for couples to sleep comfortably and freely. With 40cm more width than a Queen size mattress, a King size mattress offers a spacious and comfortable sleep experience for two people.

This extra width is particularly beneficial for couples who toss and turn in their sleep or for those who value ample space to move around while sleeping.

King size mattresses do require more space than other mattress sizes, so it's important to consider the size of your bedroom before purchasing one.

settings.title:
Super King Mattress

203cm x 203cm
settings.content:
Super king size mattresses offer several benefits for sleepers who prioritise spaciousness and comfort. The biggest advantage of a super king size bed is the extra space it provides. Measuring a luxurious 203 cm wide by 203cm long, this bed size offers ample space for a couple to sleep comfortably without disturbing each other. With such a large surface area, couples can easily move around during the night without feeling cramped or confined, making it an ideal choice for those who prefer a more spacious sleep environment.

Another benefit of a super king size bed is the added versatility it offers. The spaciousness of this bed size makes it a great choice for families with young children, as parents can comfortably sleep with their child if necessary.
